alert.note: Alert for Houston (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 19 at 7:17PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Houston County through 745 PM EDT... At 717 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Perry, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Perry, Warner Robins, Robins AFB, Hayneville, Meadowdale, Sand Bed, Houston Lake, Grovania, Grove Park, Moss Oak, Bonaire, Kathleen and Clinchfield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
